r.d: This is the Querysim MDB2 driver.
r.n: - increased php dependency to 4.3.0 due to the usage of the streams API since beta5 - fix PHP4.4 breakage - use !empty() instead of isset() in fetchRow to determine if result cols were bound or result types were set - moved all private fetch mode fix methods into _fixResultArrayValues() for performance reasons - renamed MDB2_PORTABILITY_LOWERCASE to MDB2_PORTABILITY_FIX_CASE and use 'field_case' option to determine if to upper- or lowercase (CASE_LOWER/CASE_UPPER) - use array_key_exists() instead of isset() where possible - return 0 for manipulation queries when disable_query is enabled
